AUTOREAD.description: Type TRUE if you want FIGANINTY to autoread your messages

FOR_NOTIFICATION.description: Type the number you will like to be recieving notification when bot restarts..

OPEN_AI_KEY.description: Enter your Open AI key for .ai-img and .ai functionality. You can leave blank and Use .gpt command

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Put TRUE if you want FIGANINTY to automatically be online.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Put TRUE if you want FIGANINTY to view whatsapp status automatically.

WA_PRESENCE.description: Put value as recording if you FIGANINTY to be recording all times and typing for typing

PREFIX.description: Put any symbol. Leave it blank if you want FIGANINTY to reply to all commands without prefix

APP_NAME.description: Paste the name that you had put above

HEROKU_API.description: Get from heroku account settings tab

OWNER.description: Type the numbers you will like to be Owners,Separate with a comma.
